title: Font List Printing Program
content:
Does anyone know of a OSX program that will print a cataloge of fonts by name in the actual typeface?

For example “Futura” would actualy be listed in futura typeface.

I know for os9 there is FONT Lister and font ganderer pro.

Thanks

 [‹ Font sample software](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021182035/http:/typophile.com/node/13243 "Go to previous forum topic") [Adobe "optical" fonts -- a team effort? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021182035/http:/typophile.com/node/13173 "Go to next forum topic")
author: samiam1973

comments.content: [FontAgent Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021182035/http:/www.fontagent.com/) will do it and much more. But there probably are free apps that will do only the catalog printing if you search for “font print” at [versiontracker.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021182035/http:/versiontracker.com/).
Look for Font Book at Versiontracker.com, I’m pretty sure that might help. But, Stephen is right, FontAgent is a better alternative.
